description: Lists all roles that are assigned to the user for a given AWS account.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description: The token issued by the CreateToken API call. For more information, see CreateToken in the IAM Identity Center OIDC API Reference Guide.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier for the AWS account that is assigned to the user.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The page token client that is used to retrieve the list of accounts.

nested_items.name: roleList
nested_items.description: A paginated response with the list of roles and the next token if more results are available.

nested_items.name: roleName
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the role that is assigned to the user.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the AWS account assigned to the user.
